thread.title: Celebrities who’ve rocked (nearly) naked looks

title: Celebrities who’ve rocked (nearly) naked looks
text: Yahoo Canada Style February 21, 2017 Bella Hadid was spotted baring her bod in a sexy, see-through mesh crop top and cross-shaped pasties as she went out for dinner at London’s Sexy Fish restaurant and partied at The Box nightclub with fellow models Kendall Jenner, Hailey Baldwin and Stella Maxwell during London Fashion week. The supermodel modestly paired the top with Kangol headwear, a black trench coat and low-rise, skull patterned lace-up jeans—giving us all sorts of effortlessly chic vibes! Are you loving Bella’s sheer top? Click through the gallery to see other celebrities who took sheer dresses, high slits, mini skirts and plunging necklines to the extreme. Let us know what you think by tweeting @ YahooStyleCA!
